name: Strike of a Windmill
description:
Submission for the Public Domain Jam!

The game has a chance to crash due to a rotationscript bug in the windmill itself. I couldn't get it fixed in time, so please bear with it.

For those who have Unity and would like to play around with the settings, my source files can be found over here

In case the game breaks before you can play it, download and play it here!
